title: Detoxifying Our Lives & Food Cannot Be A Reward
description:
Jillian gives a real eye opener on how we can get the toxic stuff OUT of our lives.  Then Jillian gets into calls with questions on fitness, nutrition, inspiration and overall wellness.  One woman is using food as the ultimate reward.  Guess how Jillian deals with that?

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
